splits.name: Amazon.com, Inc.
splits.notes: Board approved Mar 9, 2022. Shareholders approved May 25, 2022. Record date May 27, 2022. 19 additional shares reflected in accounts on or about June 3, 2022. Split-adjusted trading began June 6, 2022. First split since 1999.

splits.name: Copart, Inc.
splits.notes: Special meeting Oct 3, 2022 approved amendment to Certificate of Incorporation increasing authorized shares from 400M to 1.6B. Certificate filed with Delaware Secretary of State Oct 31, 2022. SEC 8-K filed Nov 2, 2022. One additional share distributed Nov 3, 2022. Split-adjusted trading began Nov 4, 2022.

splits.name: DexCom, Inc.
splits.notes: Board approved Mar 25, 2022. Shareholders approved at annual meeting May 19, 2022. Record date May 19, 2022. Three additional shares distributed; split-adjusted trading began June 10, 2022. First stock split in company history.

splits.name: Fortinet, Inc.
splits.notes: Disclosed Apr 22, 2022. Shareholders approved at annual meeting June 17, 2022. Effective June 22, 2022. Split-adjusted trading began June 23, 2022. Second split in company history (first was 2:1 in 2011).

splits.name: GameStop Corp.
splits.notes: Board approved Jul 6, 2022. Record date Jul 18, 2022. Three additional shares distributed after close Jul 21, 2022. Split-adjusted trading began Jul 22, 2022.

splits.name: Alphabet Inc.
splits.notes: Board approved Feb 1, 2022. Shareholders approved June 1, 2022. Record date Jul 1, 2022. 19 additional shares distributed after close Jul 15, 2022. Split-adjusted trading began Jul 18, 2022. Applied to all three share classes (Class A GOOGL, Class B, and Class C GOOG). First split since 2014.

splits.name: Nasdaq, Inc.
splits.notes: Board approved Apr 20, 2022. Shareholders and SEC approved June 2022. Record date Aug 12, 2022. Two additional shares distributed Aug 26, 2022. Split-adjusted trading began Aug 29, 2022. First stock split in company history.

splits.name: Palo Alto Networks, Inc.
splits.notes: Board approved Aug 22, 2022. Record date Sep 6, 2022. Two additional shares distributed after close Sep 13, 2022. Split-adjusted trading began Sep 14, 2022. First stock split in company history.

splits.name: Shopify Inc.
splits.notes: Board approved Apr 11, 2022. Shareholders approved Jun 7, 2022. Record date Jun 22, 2022. Nine additional shares distributed Jun 28, 2022. Split-adjusted trading began Jun 29, 2022. Applied to both Class A and Class B shares.

splits.name: Tesla, Inc.
splits.notes: Shareholders approved Aug 4, 2022. Record date Aug 17, 2022. Two additional shares distributed after close Aug 24, 2022. Split-adjusted trading began Aug 25, 2022. Second split in company history (first was 5:1 in Aug 2020).
